entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is introduced as a person who stops her swing and scolds Lily for not following the rules. She is described as making a crunching, grinding sound by dragging her sandals on the ground.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is introduced as a person who disobeys her mother's rules and flies through the air. She is described as giggling and showing off to Petunia.

entities.name: mummy
entities.description: Mummy is introduced as a person who told Lily not to fly through the air. Her name is used by both Petunia and Lily to scold each other.

entities.name: tuney
entities.description: Tuney is introduced as a person who is being addressed by Lily, asking him to watch what she can do.

relationships.description: Petunia scolds Lily for not following the rules, as described by Petunia's statement 'Mummy told you not to!' and Lily's response 'But I'm fine'.
Lily shows off her flying skills to Petunia, as described by Lily's statement 'Tuney, look at this. Watch what I can do'.
Mummy told Lily not to fly through the air, as described by Petunia's statement 'Mummy told you not to!' and Lily's response 'But I'm fine'.
